data.message: Thank you Facebook between you and god above lead me to my Mach and I say thank you

replies.message: You’re absolutely welcome, Debbie! Thank you for being a part of our community. -Chantal

Hi Richard. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/205730929485170. -Chantal

Anything, even a cent, would be much appreciated. Please read the description in the link below. It's my third week in college and I need a laptop. I will not allow this to be an impediment to my success. My mother doesn't work and my savings aren't enough for anything. I would appreciate no negative comments even if they're jokes. If you're generous enough to support, do so. If not, just keep scrolling. Thank you so much. http://www.gofundme.com/f7tvx0

I'm sorry Hun however I can give you some advice on getting a good lab top i know going thew collage is very expensive however if you go to best buy or Walmart they have a layaway plain to help show your student id and they will give you a break on it I know it dosent help at the moment however Christmas is coming and good deals will be had at either place however for now I would suggest the computer lab on school grounds and a good disk driver like Sony to back up your files you can get a good deal at office max good luck I hope my advice helps
